summary: Water quality is stable but pH is slightly below optimal range for tilapia.

insights.recommendation: Consider adding pH buffers to maintain optimal range (6.5-8.5).
Monitor TDS levels; consider water changes if it continues to rise.
Maintain temperature between 24-28°C for optimal growth.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.033 / 7.005 / 7.106 (trend: flat)
• TDS avg/min/max: 334.064 / 307.8 / 342.7 ppm (trend: up)
• Temp avg/min/max: 24.116 / 20.94 / 29.62 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
